name: Toggle Switch
author: Karthik Viswanathan, Arron Schaar
description: An on-off switch that can be toggled with a click.

attributes.on-text: Sets the text displayed in on mode.
attributes.off-text: Sets the text displayed in off mode.
attributes.input-name: Name to be used on the input element.
attributes.label: Pretty label name. The label will use input-name if this is not provided.

events.on: Triggered when the toggle switch is turned on.
events.off: Triggered when the toggle switch is turned off.

getters.onText: Gets the text displayed in on mode.
getters.offText: Gets the text displayed in off mode.
getters.inputName: Gets the form input's name attribute.
getters.label: Gets the label text.

setters.onText: Sets the text displayed in on mode in the data-on-text attribute.
setters.offText: Sets the text displayed in off mode in the data-off-text attribute.
setters.inputName: Sets the form input element's name attribute.
setters.label: Sets the label text.
